expo.name: My Daily Muse
expo.description: A personal journaling app to capture your thoughts, memories, and daily experiences with mood tracking and media support.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos for your journal entries.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to add images to your journal entries.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to tag your journal entries with places.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio for your journal entries.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to take photos for journal entries.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to add them to journal entries.

plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save photos to your camera roll.
